name: Super Tuna Robot Wars
description:
Dangerous alien marine robots are attacking the under the sea! The marine world is under attack! Awakened by the trial of dreams, you've no choice but to take on the heroic mantle of saving the marine world!

As a super tuna with unlimited potential, you and your friends will have to pick up new weapons and battle these evil and dangerous alien robots!

The horde far outnumbers you - any slip-up and you'll get caught in dire straits!

= Control =

Keyboad: Move with Arrow or WASD and Shoot left Ctrl, Boom left Alt

X-Box Controller compatible

= Super Tuna Battle System =

Defeat the alien robots and earn coins to get the highest score. Also, get powers, upgrade weapons and add sidearms, and explode boom.
